taskDescription:
Construct a truth table to analyze all the possible outcomes and determine the validity of the following argument.

~ p ∨ q   ↔   ~ q →   ~ p \text{~}p \vee q{\text{ }} \leftrightarrow {\text{ }}\text{~}q \to {\text{ }}\text{~}p
